detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Forxed (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forxed.sol#56-170) has payable functions:
	 - Forxed.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forxed.sol#167-169)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [Forxed](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forxed.sol#L56-L170) has payable functions:
	 - [Forxed.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Forxed.sol#L167-L169)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
